breach_of_fairness: no breach of duty of fairness found
relevant_rule: Duty of fairness requires disclosure if it affects an individual's ability to present their case meaningfully, but not for publicly available documents or extrinsic evidence.
evidence_consideration: undisclosed documents (e.g., Burton Report) were publicly available and applicant had opportunity to address concerns
decision_reasoning: PCDO did not breach duty of fairness as all relied-upon documents were publicly available and applicant had ample opportunity to respond
cause_of_action: Applicant sought judicial review after being denied membership in the PDRCC class due to lack of serious risk upon return to China
